mapper.select: SELECT category_level1.id AS category_level1_id, category_level1.name AS category_level1_name, category_level2.id AS category_level2_id, category_level2.name AS category_level2_name, category_level3.id AS category_level3_id, category_level3.name AS category_level3_name FROM yunhe.mall_goods_category category_level1 INNER JOIN yunhe.mall_goods_category category_level2 ON category_level1.id = category_level2.parent_id INNER JOIN yunhe.mall_goods_category category_level3 ON category_level2.id = category_level3.parent_id;

SELECT * FROM yunhe.mall_goods_item a WHERE id IN (SELECT t.goods_item_id FROM (SELECT goods_item_id FROM yunhe.mall_goods_category_and_goods_item b WHERE b.goods_name LIKE concat('%', #{wd}, '%') OR b.goods_item_name LIKE concat('%', #{wd}, '%') OR category_level1_name LIKE concat('%', #{wd}, '%') OR category_level2_name LIKE concat('%', #{wd}, '%') OR category_level3_name LIKE concat('%', #{wd}, '%') limit 0, 20) as t)
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
ORDER BY a.price DESC
ORDER BY a.price ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO yunhe.user_goods_item_collection (user_id, goods_item_id, collected, create_time, update_time, goods_item_name, pic, price, `desc`, state) (SELECT #{userId}, #{goodsItemId}, #{collected}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, name, pic, price, `desc`, state FROM yunhe.mall_goods_item WHERE id = #{goodsItemId});
